amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 116-51 to prohibit the Secretaries from taking any such action that would reduce the number of individuals enrolled in coverage that is at least as comprehensive as the coverage defined in section 1302 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Porter.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
